h6501.definition: or פֶּרֶה; (Jeremiah 2:24), from {{h6500}} in the secondary sense of running wild; the onager; wild (ass).

h6502.definition: from {{h6501}}; wildly; Piram, a Canaanite; Piram.

h6503.definition: or פַּרְוָר; of foreign origin; Parbar or Parvar, a quarter of Jerusalem; Parbar, suburb.

h6504.definition: a primitive root; to break through, i.e. spread or separate (oneself); disperse, divide, be out of joint, part, scatter (abroad), separate (self), sever self, stretch, sunder.

h6505.definition: from {{h6504}}; a mule (perhaps from his lonely habits); mule.

h6507.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h6504}}; something separated, i.e. a kernel; seed.

h6508.definition: of foreign origin; a park; forest, orchard.

h6509.definition: a primitive root; to bear fruit (literally or figuratively); bear, bring forth (fruit), (be, cause to be, make) fruitful, grow, increase.

h6510.definition: feminine of {{h6499}}; a heifer; cow, heifer, kine.

h6511.definition: the same as {{h6510}}; Parah, a place in Palestine; Parah.

h6512.definition: from {{h6331}}; a hole (as broken, i.e. dug); + mole. Compare {{h2661}}.

h6513.definition: for {{h6288}}; foliage; Purah, an Israelite; Phurah.

h6514.definition: or פְּרִידָא; from {{h6504}}; dispersion; Peruda or Perida, one of 'Solomon's servants'; Perida, Peruda.

h6515.definition: passive participle of {{h6524}}; blossomed; Paruach, an Israelite; Paruah.

h6516.definition: of foreign origin; Parvajim, an Oriental region; Parvaim.

h6517.definition: passive participle of {{h6565}} in the sense of spreading out (compare {{h6524}}); a skillet (as flat or deep); pan, pot.

h6518.definition: from an unused root meaning to separate, i.e. decide; a chieftain; village.

h6519.definition: from the same as {{h6518}}; an open country; (unwalled) town (without walls), unwalled village.

h6520.definition: from the same as {{h6518}}; magistracy, i.e. leadership (also concretely, chieftains); village.

h6521.definition: or פְּרוֹזִי; from {{h6519}}; a rustic; village.

h6522.definition: for {{h6521}}; inhabitant of the open country; a Perizzite, one of the Canaanitish tribes; Perizzite.

h6524.definition: a primitive root; to break forth as a bud, i.e. bloom; generally, to spread; specifically, to fly (as extending the wings); figuratively, to flourish; × abroad, × abundantly, blossom, break forth (out), bud, flourish, make fly, grow, spread, spring (up).

h6525.definition: from {{h6524}}; a calyx (natural or artificial); generally, bloom; blossom, bud, flower.

h6526.definition: from {{h6524}}; progeny, i.e. a brood; youth.

h6527.definition: a primitive root; to scatter words, i.e. prate (or hum); chant.

h6528.definition: from {{h6527}}; a stray or single berry; grape.

h6529.definition: from {{h6509}}; fruit (literally or figuratively); bough, (first-)fruit(-ful), reward.

h6530.definition: from {{h6555}}; violent, i.e. a tyrant; destroyer, ravenous, robber.

h6531.definition: from an unused root meaning to break apart; fracture, i.e. severity; cruelty, rigour.

h6532.definition: feminine active participle of the same as {{h6531}}; a separatrix, i.e. (the sacred) screen; vail.

h6533.definition: a primitive root; to tear; rend.

h6534.definition: of Persian origin; Parmashta, a son of Haman; Parmasta.

h6535.definition: of uncertain derivation; Parnak, an Israelite; Parnach.

h6536.definition: a primitive root; to break in pieces, i.e. (usually without violence) to split, distribute; deal, divide, have hoofs, part, tear.

h6537.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6536}}; to split up; divide, (U-) pharsin.

h6538.definition: from {{h6536}}; a claw; also a kind of eagle; claw, ossifrage.

h6539.definition: of foreign origin; Paras (i.e. Persia), an Eastern country, including its inhabitants; Persia, Persians.

h6541.definition: feminine of {{h6538}}; a claw or split hoof; claw, (cloven-) footed, hoof.

h6542.definition: patrial from {{h6539}}; a Parsite (i.e. Persian), or inhabitant of Peres; Persian.

h6544.definition: a primitive root; to loosen; by implication, to expose, dismiss; figuratively, absolve, begin; avenge, avoid, bare, go back, let, (make) naked, set at nought, perish, refuse, uncover.

h6546.definition: feminine of {{h6545}} (in the sense of beginning); leadership (plural concretely, leaders); avenging, revenge.

h6547.definition: of Egyptian derivation; Paroh, a general title of Egyptian kings; Pharaoh.

h6548.definition: of Egyptian derivation; Paroh-Chophra, an Egyptian king; Pharaoh-hophra.

h6549.definition: or פַּרְעֹה נְכוֹ; of Egyptian derivation; Paroh-Nekoh (or -Neko), an Egyptian king; Pharaoh-necho, Pharaohnechoh.

h6550.definition: probably from {{h6544}} and {{h6211}}; a flea (as the isolated insect); flea.

h6551.definition: the same as {{h6550}}; Parosh, the name of our Israelite; Parosh, Pharosh.

h6552.definition: from {{h6546}}; chieftaincy; Pirathon, a place in Palestine; Pirathon.

h6553.definition: or פִּרְעָתֹנִי; patrial from {{h6552}}; a Pirathonite or inhabitant of Pirathon; Pirathonite.

h6554.definition: probably from {{h6565}} in the sense of rushing; rapid; Parpar, a river of Syria; Pharpar.

h6555.definition: a primitive root; to break out (in many applications, direct and indirect, literal and figurative); × abroad, (make a) breach, break (away, down, -er, forth, in, up), burst out, come (spread) abroad, compel, disperse, grow, increase, open, press, scatter, urge.

h6556.definition: from {{h6555}}; a break (literally or figuratively); breach, breaking forth (in), × forth, gap.

h6557.definition: the same as {{h6556}}; Perets, the name of two Israelites; Perez, Pharez.

h6558.definition: patronymically from {{h6557}}; a Partsite (collectively) or descendants of Perets; Pharzites.

h6559.definition: plural of {{h6556}}; breaks; Peratsim, a mountain in Palestine; Perazim.

h6560.definition: from {{h6556}} and {{h5798}}; break of Uzza; Perets-Uzza, a place in Palestine; Perezuzza.

h6561.definition: a primitive root; to break off or crunch; figuratively, to deliver; break (off), deliver, redeem, rend (in pieces), tear in pieces.

h6562.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6561}}; to discontinue; break off.

h6563.definition: from {{h6561}}; rapine; also a fork (in roads); crossway, robbery.

h6564.definition: from {{h6561}}; soup (as full of crumbed meat); broth. See also {{h4832}}.

h6565.definition: a primitive root; to break up (usually figuratively), i.e. to violate, frustrate; × any ways, break (asunder), cast off, cause to cease, × clean, defeat, disannul, disappoint, dissolve, divide, make of none effect, fail, frustrate, bring (come) to nought, × utterly, make void.

h6566.definition: a primitive root; to break apart, disperse, etc.; break, chop in pieces, lay open, scatter, spread (abroad, forth, selves, out), stretch (forth, out).

h6567.definition: a primitive root; to separate, literally (to disperse) or figuratively (to specify); also (by implication) to wound; scatter, declare, distinctly, shew, sting.

h6570.definition: the same as {{h6569}}; Peresh, an Israelite; Peresh.

h6571.definition: from {{h6567}}; (compare {{h5483}}); a steed (as stretched out to a vehicle, not single nor for mounting ); also (by implication) a driver (in a chariot), i.e. (collectively) cavalry; horseman.

h6572.definition: or פַּתְשֶׁגֶן; of foreign origin; a transcript; copy.

h6574.definition: perhaps by compounding {{h6567}} and {{h6504}} (in the sense of straddling) (compare {{h6576}}); the crotch (or anus); dirt.

h6576.definition: a root apparently formed by compounding {{h6567}} and that of {{h6518}} (compare {{h6574}}); to expand; spread.

h6577.definition: of Persian origin; Parshandatha, a son of Haman; Parshandatha.

h6578.definition: from an unused root meaning to break forth; rushing; Perath (i.e. Euphrates), a river of the East; Euphrates.

h6579.definition: of Persian origin; a grandee; (most) noble, prince.

h6580.definition: probably from an unused root meaning to disintegrate; stupidity (as a result of grossness or of degeneracy); extremity.

h6581.definition: a primitive root; to spread; spread.

h6582.definition: a primitive root; to tear in pieces; pull in pieces.

h6583.definition: probably from {{h6582}}; liberation; Pashchur, the name of four Israelites; Pashur.

h6584.definition: a primitive root; to spread out (i.e. deploy in hostile array); by analogy, to strip (i.e. unclothe, plunder, flay, etc.); fall upon, flay, invade, make an invasion, pull off, put off, make a road, run upon, rush, set, spoil, spread selves (abroad), strip (off, self).

h6585.definition: a primitive root; to stride (from spreading the legs), i.e. rush upon; go.

h6586.definition: a primitive root (identical with through the idea of expansion); to break away (from just authority), i.e. trespass, apostatize, quarrel; offend, rebel, revolt, transgress(-ion, -or).

h6588.definition: from {{h6586}}; a revolt (national, moral or religious); rebellion, sin, transgression, trespass.

h6589.definition: a primitive root; to dispart (the feet or lips), i.e. become licentious; open (wide).

h6590.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6622}}; to interpret; make (interpretations), interpreting.

h6593.definition: from the same as {{h6580}} as in the sense of comminuting; linen (i.e. the thread, as carded); flax, linen.

h6594.definition: feminine of {{h6593}}; flax; by implication, a wick; flax, tow.

h6595.definition: from {{h6626}}; a bit; meat, morsel, piece.

h6596.definition: or פֹּתָה; (Ezekiel 13:19), from an unused root meaning to open; a hole, i.e. hinge or the female pudenda; hinge, secret participle

h6597.definition: or פִּתְאֹם; from {{h6621}}; instantly; straightway, sudden(-ly).

h6598.definition: of Persian origin; a dainty; portion (provision) of meat.

h6599.definition: of Persian origin; a (judicial) sentence; decree, sentence.

h6600.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6599}}; a word, answer, letter or decree; answer, letter, matter, word.
